chunks.chunk_text: What pop meansChanges depending on what angle you are looking fromIt can be a descriptor of audience sizeIndicating something that is popularOr it can be a genre tagSpecifying a soundBut for much of the past three decadesThese two definitions have effectively been one and the sameYou know the sortKaty Perry's confetti cheer
